name: The Dragons' Children - Demo
description:
The Dragons' Children is a WIP game where you play as an LGBT+ royal person who has been disowned by their family and cast out - and taken in by the Draconic Trio instead. Trigger warnings for references to homophobia and transphobia and etc., but otherwise it's a game about finding a place for yourself with people who understand and care about you.

You can play as a cis male, cis female, trans male, trans female, AMAB NB or AFAB NB, choose between three different outfit options for your character, and be straight (only if you're trans or NB), gay, bi, pan or aro, and meet similarly varied characters in the Draconic Trio's castle - and possibly find love as well, either with one of your fellow Lost Royals, or even with one of the Draconic Trio!

This demo is very short and is only meant to demonstrate how the gameplay will work. However what is not included within the demo however is the main romance system (although there is affection and you do get to give someone a gift before it ends).
